contentrichtext.text: '''Jug''' or '''Jugs''' may refer to: * [[Jug (container)]], a vessel for liquids * Australian term for [[Kettle#Electric_kettles | Electric Kettle]]. New Zealand Term for [[Kettle]]. * [[Jug (instrument)]], a musical instrument used for rhythmic bass accompaniment * [[Jug (dog)]], cross breed between a [[Pug]] and a [[Jack Russell Terrier]] * [[Jug (album)|''Jug (album)]], an album by jazz saxophonist Gene Ammons, also the musician's nickname * [[Java User Group]] (JUG), a group of people who meet to discuss the Java programming language * Jug, an onomatopoeic representation of a [[nightingale]]'s call * Jug, nickname for the [[P-47 Thunderbolt]] * [[Jug Rock]], a natural geological formation located outside of Shoals, Indiana, in the United States * [[Jug sling]], a type of knot man * [[Jughandle]], a type of road junction * ''In the jug'', slang term for [[prison]] or [[Detention (imprisonment)]] * [[VK Jug Dubrovnik]], a water polo club from Dubrovnik, Croatia * Short for Spanish ''jugar'', meaning [[play (activity)|play]]. * ''Jugs'', a slang term for women's [[breast]]s - especially large sized. Derived from characterization of breast as a milk carrying and delivery device (cf. "Milk Jug"). * ''[[Juggs]]'', a U.S. soft-core pornographic magazine ==See also== * [[Little Brown Jug (disambiguation)]] * [[Jugging]] {{disambiguation}}
